availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Daniel G. Mitchell (Taylor County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, clerk. Kentucky native. Father of Clement Mitchell. Clerk in Taylor County. Resident of Taylor County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor, Campbellsville, p. 234B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 4th Congressional District, Jefferson County, Vol.2 of 3, N.D., p. 325 (p. 29 of 283 of microfilm), (Accessed via ancestry.com on June 30, 2020).
KYR-0001-004-1383.
